results.title: Old dogs, new tricks
results.brief_description: You learn till you die … it’s the only way. Diminishing mental faculties are not a necessary outcome of old age. This heartening film focuses on a number of people for whom retirement and old age have only served as a springboard to new activities and skills. It clearly demonstrates that stimulation is an important part of keeping independent and motivated.

results.title: Old bottle, new wine
results.brief_description: Tarrango, the first commercially produced all-Austgralian wine is the success story of Merbein, Victoria, horticultural researchers’ quest to breed wine grapes that are uniquely Australian.

results.title: Oil: our hidden wealth
results.creator_credit: Richard Mason, Jack S. Allan and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
results.brief_description: Studies the search for oil in Australia, showing how oil is formed, the personnel and equipment needed in drilling a well, and how results of seismic recordings are interpreted. Describes actual drilling in Australia and Papua New Guinea.

results.title: Oil: its origin and use
results.brief_description: This video, presented in four distinct sections, is a general introduction to work in the oil industry. It shows the story of oil and gas from their origins to uses. The sections include- origin and search: shows how oil and gas originated millions of years ago and how modern scientists discover the unlikely whereabouts of underground reservoirs. Drilling: shows how an exploration well is drilled on land, and contrasts this with modern offshore developments. Refining: shows how crude oil is converted into a host of useful products through the refinery process. Distribution and use: shows how these products are distributed all over the world, and used in an endless variety of ways.

results.title: Oil review. No. 10
results.creator_credit: Humphrey Swingler, Anglo Iranian Oil Company and Greenpark Productions
results.brief_description: Magazine film in three sections: “War on winter” - showing modern methods of land clearance in northern Sweden; “Work on wax” - showing how another oil product is finding a multitude of everyday uses; “London’s times” - how oil helps to keep the phenomenal accuracy of the famous Big Ben.
